meanings.sent1: Fanks for helping me with my homework.
meanings.sent2: I always say fanks when someone gives me a gift.
meanings.sent3: When I dropped my books, my friend said fanks for the mess.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with fanks as she received the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with fanks after the kind gesture.

meanings.sent1: I have two fanks in my collection of souvenirs.
meanings.sent2: The box was filled with colorful fanks from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The fanks on the shelf looked like a rainbow of memories.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a garden of fanks, each one representing a special moment.
meanings.sent5: The jar overflowed with fanks, each one a token of gratitude.
